Package com.model.features

Class LeaderboardModel

java.lang.Object
com.model.features.LeaderboardModel
public class LeaderboardModel
extends java.lang.Object
Model for Leaderboard view Stores user results and calculates scoreboard when called
Author:
Zain Rashid
